reason.raw: You already pushed the changeset to default and submitted a pull request to change the maxwl branch. I will put the changeset back onto default though.
reason.html: You already pushed the changeset to default and submitted a pull request to change the maxwl branch. I will put the changeset back onto default though.

description.raw:
I modified segway-posterior to output the segmentation produced by annotating each position with the highest-probability label at that position (also known as the posterior code), in addition to the posterior values, which it already outputs.  The posterior code file is output to path given with the --bed argument (outdir/segway.bed.gz by default).

In doing so, I also consolidated some duplicated code that appeared in both PosteriorSaver and IdentifySaver into a function called concatenate_window_segmentations().  

I submitted a pull request to the bitbucket repository.

Max

In doing so, I also consolidated some duplicated code that appeared in both PosteriorSaver and IdentifySaver into a function called concatenate_window_segmentations().

I submitted a pull request to the bitbucket repository.

Max
